hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The Muslim should not purchase in opposition to his brother, and he should not make the proposal of marriage on the proposal already made by his brother

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ الْخِطْبَةِ عَلَى خِطْبَةِ أَخِيهِ حَتَّى يَأْذَنَ أَوْ يَتْرُكَ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of proposing marriage when one's brother has already proposed, unless he gives permission or gives up the idea
